---
title: "MN Opioid Deaths"
output: html_notebook
---

```{r setup}
library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)
```

## Download the data

```{r}
download.file("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/utdata/chj-r-introduction/main/data/chj_mn_opiate_deaths_data.csv", "data-raw/opioid_deaths.csv")
```

## Import the file

```{r}
deaths <- read_csv("data-raw/opioid_deaths.csv") %>% clean_names()

deaths %>% head()
```

### Glimpse the data

```{r}
deaths %>% glimpse()
```

## Get summary stats

```{r}
deaths %>% summary()
```
